definition: completely, providing no shelter or sustenance
details:
adverb
- completely
= example: completely
= synonyms: plumb
adjective
- providing no shelter or sustenance
= synonyms: bare, barren, bleak, desolate
- complete or extreme
= example: complete or extreme
- severely simple
= example: severely simple
= synonyms: austere, severe, stern
- devoid of any qualifications or disguise or adornment
= synonyms: crude
- without qualification
= synonyms: arrant, complete, consummate, double-dyed, everlasting, gross, perfect, pure, sodding, staring, thoroughgoing, utter, unadulterated
